name: Allergic Contact Dermatitis
chief_complaint: I have a red, itchy rash on my arm that won't go away.
prognosis: excellent with allergen avoidance, symptoms resolve within 2-4 weeks
description: A delayed hypersensitivity reaction occurring when skin comes into contact with an allergen, causing an inflammatory response. Common allergens include nickel, fragrances, and certain plants like poison ivy.
